mutations.name: Mythic Perfect Crystal
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a flawless crystalline structure of godlike perfection
mutations.effectDescription: Creates an almost indestructible formation with perfect structural integrity and energy conductivity

mutations.name: Mythic Quantum Singularity
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a controlled quantum singularity
mutations.effectDescription: Particles collapse into an ultra-dense formation with gravitational effects and extreme energy output

mutations.name: Mythic Cosmic Web
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a miniature replica of the cosmic web
mutations.effectDescription: Particles extend across vast distances in a web-like pattern, allowing unprecedented control range

mutations.name: Mythic Stellar Core
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a miniature stellar core
mutations.effectDescription: Particles undergo continuous fusion reactions, generating enormous energy and radiating intense power

mutations.name: Mythic Divine Geometry
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's formation into a pattern of perfect divine geometry
mutations.effectDescription: Particles arrange in a sacred geometric pattern that resonates with the fundamental structure of reality
